snippet.title: Minotaur Kickstarter trailer
snippet.description:
UPD: Minotaur now has a "Coming Soon" Steam Store page where you can add it to your wishlist to definitely not miss it: http://store.steampowered.com/app/680590/Minotaur/ 

Minotaur is an adventure game with visual novel-style narrative, which tells a dark mystery story set in a newly created science fantasy world. This was our Kickstarter trailer... And our campaign succeeded! We've even managed to hit a couple of stretch goals, all thanks to our backers and people who supported us in any other way. Thank you!!

You can check out Minotaur development status in our KS updates:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/u7committee/minotaur-a-point-and-click-visual-novel/updates

You can also download and play a fully voiced one hour long demo for PC and Mac:

GameJolt - http://gamejolt.com/games/minotaur/182778
Indie DB - http://www.indiedb.com/games/u7minotaur/downloads/minotaur-020-demo-win
itch.io - https://u7committee.itch.io/minotaur
Our website - http://www.uof7.com/minotaur
